src.core.unitree_control_core module¶

class src.core.unitree_control_core.UnitreeGo2Controller(use_sdk: bool | None)[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the main entry point that students/users interact with. Modules are accessed via enum types for compile-time safety.

add_module(module_type: ModuleType, **kwargs) → None[source]¶

Add a new module to the controller using enum type.

Parameters:

  • module_type – The type of module to add (from ModuleType enum)

  • **kwargs – Constructor arguments for the module

Example

controller.add_module(ModuleType.VIDEO, use_sdk=True)

property audio: AudioModule¶
get_available_modules() → list[ModuleType][source]¶

List all modules available for the current mode (SDK/simulation)
